name: LittleBigPlanet Karting
summary: LittleBigPlanet Karting is a kart racing game for the PlayStation 3, centred around user-generated content, as part of the LittleBigPlanet series. The game is developed by United Front Games, who had previously developed the 2010 user-generated content kart racing game ModNation Racers for the PlayStation 3, in conjunction with series creators Media Molecule. The game was published by Sony Computer Entertainment and was released in November 2012.
info:
• 中文名: 小小大星球：卡丁车
